title: Advanced Workplace Communication
objective: Learn to express ideas clearly in formal and informal workplace settings using appropriate register.
examples: I’d like to clarify the project requirements.
Let me walk you through the process.
learningOutcome: Learn to express ideas clearly in formal and informal workplace settings using appropriate register.

title: Professional Emails and Reports
objective: Write detailed emails and technical reports using formal structures and technical language.
examples: Attached you will find the updated schedule.
The report outlines the system performance.
learningOutcome: Write detailed emails and technical reports using formal structures and technical language.

title: Technical Presentations
objective: Prepare and deliver structured presentations on technical topics using appropriate vocabulary and transitions.
examples: In this slide, we can see the workflow stages.
To summarize, the system saves 30% energy.
learningOutcome: Prepare and deliver structured presentations on technical topics using appropriate vocabulary and transitions.

title: Meetings and Negotiations
objective: Participate effectively in meetings and negotiate roles, tasks, and solutions.
examples: I suggest we assign two technicians to this task.
Can we reach an agreement on the deadline?
learningOutcome: Participate effectively in meetings and negotiate roles, tasks, and solutions.

title: Project Planning and Management
objective: Discuss project phases, milestones, responsibilities, and risks using future and conditional forms.
examples: If we don’t deliver on time, we risk a penalty.
The next milestone is the system integration.
learningOutcome: Discuss project phases, milestones, responsibilities, and risks using future and conditional forms.

title: Troubleshooting and Diagnostics
objective: Describe complex problems, diagnostic procedures, and possible solutions.
examples: We suspect a failure in the pressure sensor.
Run a diagnostic before replacing the part.
learningOutcome: Describe complex problems, diagnostic procedures, and possible solutions.

title: Workplace Procedures and Protocols
objective: Explain company policies, standard operating procedures, and workplace protocols.
examples: According to the protocol, all incidents must be reported immediately.
This procedure minimizes contamination risk.
learningOutcome: Explain company policies, standard operating procedures, and workplace protocols.

title: Specialized Vocabulary in Your Field
objective: Use advanced vocabulary specific to your technical specialty (e.g., electronics, mechanics, agronomy).
examples: The PLC system controls the conveyor belt.
We apply phytosanitary treatments monthly.
learningOutcome: Use advanced vocabulary specific to your technical specialty (e.g., electronics, mechanics, agronomy).

title: Data Analysis and Interpretation
objective: Understand and describe charts, graphs, trends, and technical data in reports and discussions.
examples: As shown in the chart, the voltage drops after 10 seconds.
This trend indicates increased efficiency.
learningOutcome: Understand and describe charts, graphs, trends, and technical data in reports and discussions.

title: Environmental Responsibility and Sustainability
objective: Discuss sustainable practices and environmental impact in the technical sector.
examples: We implemented a solar energy system to reduce emissions.
Sustainable design reduces energy consumption.
learningOutcome: Discuss sustainable practices and environmental impact in the technical sector.

title: Job Applications and Resumes
objective: Write advanced resumes and cover letters tailored to technical job opportunities.
examples: My experience includes automation system installation.
Enclosed is my resume for the maintenance role.
learningOutcome: Write advanced resumes and cover letters tailored to technical job opportunities.

title: Advanced Interview Skills
objective: Respond confidently to complex interview questions and describe qualifications fluently.
examples: I developed strong troubleshooting skills during my internship.
One of my strengths is attention to detail.
learningOutcome: Respond confidently to complex interview questions and describe qualifications fluently.

title: Conflict Resolution and Ethics
objective: Learn to express opinions, manage disagreements, and refer to ethical considerations.
examples: I understand your point, but I believe we should follow protocol.
Let’s find a compromise solution.
learningOutcome: Learn to express opinions, manage disagreements, and refer to ethical considerations.

title: Describing Past Projects
objective: Talk about previous tasks and achievements using past perfect and narrative tenses.
examples: We had already tested the circuit before replacing the component.
The system malfunctioned because the settings were incorrect.
learningOutcome: Talk about previous tasks and achievements using past perfect and narrative tenses.

title: Using Conditionals in Technical Contexts
objective: Apply first, second, and third conditionals to explain technical hypotheses or consequences.
examples: If the valve had been closed, there wouldn’t have been a leak.
If we increase the voltage, the motor runs faster.
learningOutcome: Apply first, second, and third conditionals to explain technical hypotheses or consequences.

title: Expressing Probability and Uncertainty
objective: Use modal verbs and probability structures to describe likely outcomes and predictions.
examples: The temperature might rise above the safety threshold.
It’s likely that the pressure will stabilize.
learningOutcome: Use modal verbs and probability structures to describe likely outcomes and predictions.

title: Explaining Complex Processes
objective: Describe step-by-step procedures and technical systems using passive voice and linking phrases.
examples: First, the machine is assembled.
Then, the product is tested for defects.
learningOutcome: Describe step-by-step procedures and technical systems using passive voice and linking phrases.

title: Professional Networking and Collaboration
objective: Engage in professional conversations and introduce yourself at technical events.
examples: I’m working on automation projects at TEC.
Would you like to connect on LinkedIn?
learningOutcome: Engage in professional conversations and introduce yourself at technical events.

title: Reading and Responding to Technical Specifications
objective: Interpret and respond to technical specifications and requirements in professional documents.
examples: The system must support a minimum of 120 volts.
Ensure compliance with ISO standards.
learningOutcome: Interpret and respond to technical specifications and requirements in professional documents.

title: Capstone Presentation and Evaluation
objective: Prepare and present a final integrated task that combines speaking, writing, reading, and listening.
examples: Read a work order, complete a checklist, and write a summary.
Present your solution to a technical problem in pairs.
learningOutcome: Prepare and present a final integrated task that combines speaking, writing, reading, and listening.
